MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KY11 postcode area of Inverkeithing. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 5PM to safely carry out repairs on our underground cable network at Fraser Avenue and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7PM. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:49 PM on Wednesday, 18 November 2020.
